text: oh, but i'm not going home. it's wednesday, wednesday is new comic book day, we have to go to the comic book store. and then we have to stop at soup plantation, it's creamy tomato soup day, and radio shack, there's a sale on triple-a batteries. plus, we have to go to pottery barn and return my star wars sheets.
